summary: Iteration 6 testing completed. All new features working: 1) Light Mode (Editorial) toggle changes background from black to white with proper CSS overrides, 2) Link Preview API with BeautifulSoup scraping returns OG tags or graceful fallbacks, 3) Google Search URLs used for Spark posts (no 404s), 4) The Lookout - crowdsourced safety alerts with vouch/cap verification system fully functional.

issues: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent components - accessibility warning only, not blocking

Backend: /api/link-preview handles Google Search URLs with special format
Backend: /api/link-preview returns proper structure (url, domain, title, description)
Backend: /api/link-preview has fallback images for known domains
Backend: /api/lookout POST creates alert (201)
Backend: /api/lookout accepts all valid alert types (police, safety_hazard, protest, vibe_check, other)
Backend: /api/lookout rejects invalid alert types (400)

Backend: /api/lookout/{id}/vouch endpoint works
Backend: /api/lookout/{id}/cap endpoint works
Backend: /api/lookout/{id} DELETE works for own alerts
Backend: /api/spark/drop creates post with reference_url (Google Search)
Backend: /api/spark/categories returns available categories

Frontend: Login flow works correctly
Frontend: Light Mode toggle changes body classes (dark-mode -> light-mode)
Frontend: Light Mode toggle changes background color (rgb(0,0,0) -> rgb(255,255,255))
Frontend: Settings page shows Cinema Mode / Editorial Mode toggle
Frontend: Lookout Ticker appears at top of feed with verified alert count
Frontend: Lookout Panel opens when clicking ticker

critical_code_review_comments: Light Mode CSS uses !important overrides which work but could be refactored to use CSS variables more consistently
Theme state persists in localStorage but page navigation may reset it briefly - this is expected React behavior
Link preview uses BeautifulSoup with lxml parser for real OG tag scraping with graceful fallbacks
Alert verification threshold is 3 vouches, dismissal threshold is 3 caps, expiry is 2 hours - all configurable constants
seed_data_creation: Created multiple test alerts during backend testing (police, safety_hazard, protest, vibe_check, other types)

mocked_apis.notes: Link preview fetches real OG tags via BeautifulSoup when possible, falls back to domain-based info. Google Search URLs are real google.com/search links.
